title: State Estimator Analysis
description: The EMS runs a state estimator to create a complete and accurate model of the current state of the power grid, even with incomplete or noisy sensor data.

tasks.description: Gather all available real-time SCADA measurements from across the grid.
tasks.expected_outcome: System collects all available telemetry data.

tasks.description: Run the state estimation algorithm, which uses the grid topology and the measurements to calculate the most likely value for all system parameters (e.g., voltage, power flow).
tasks.expected_outcome: System produces a complete, solved power flow case.

tasks.description: Identify any bad or missing data by comparing the estimated values to the actual measurements.
tasks.expected_outcome: System flags a specific meter that is providing an erroneous reading.
